title.name: Rubber Neck
title.discription: Sit up tall and drop your right  ear down towards your right shoulder (you don’t have to touch it!) and hold for a few seconds and repeat for the left side

title.name: Reach for the Stars
title.discription: Interlace your fingers and reach up towards the sky, as high as you can … keeping your palms facing up towards the ceiling.

title.name: Look Around
title.discription: Turn your head the left and try and look over your shoulder and hold for a few seconds … repeat on the right.

title.name: Bobblehead
title.discription: Drop your chin down towards your chest and GENTLY roll your head from side to side

title.name: Shrugs
title.discription: Raise both shoulders up towards your ears and hold for a few seconds and release. Repeat a few times for good measure.

title.name: Reach and Bend
title.discription: Extend your right arm over your head and reach out as far as you can to the left and gently bend over. Hold for a few seconds and do it the other way.

title.name: Chest Opener
title.discription: Bring your hands behind your back, press your palms together, sit up tall and hold for 5–10 seconds.

title.name: Glute Squeeze
title.discription: This is an isometric move. Squeeze your glutes as hard as you can and hold for 10–30 seconds.

title.name: Wall Sit
title.discription: Another great isometric move. Stand with your back against the wall and slowly lower yourself into a seated position and hold for 10–30 seconds at a time.

title.name: Pretend Jump Rope
title.discription: Hop on both feet at once, or alternate. Increase the intensity by adding the arm movements you would do if you had a rope.
